attributes.action: Make it obligatory to make Health Warnings on day to day products large enough to read without the aid of spectacles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
More and more warnings are printed on everyday items, yet often you have to have 20/20 vision or magnification spectacles to read them. All to often people don't bother to read them because of this.
If there was a law which required that the warnings were of at least 12 point text or larger then there would be fewer accidents due to people not reading the warnings first. In other words get rid of all the small print in the world! especially contractual documents. If it has to be said, make it readable!
